thread.title: Brazil's Bradesco may raise provisions if credit market worsens
thread.title_full: Brazil's Bradesco may raise provisions if credit market worsens | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Brazil's Bradesco may raise provisions if credit market worsens
text:
SAO PAULO, July 31 Banco Bradesco SA is prepared to increase loan-loss provisions in coming months should credit market conditions in Brazil take a turn for the worse, Chief Financial Officer Luiz Carlos Angelotti said on Friday.
(Reporting by Guillermo Parra-Bernal and Alu√≠sio Alves; Editing by Chizu Nomiyama)
